entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
